title: SHOCK: Some Actual Good News About the Midterms | Guests: Tudor Dixon & Allie Beth Stuckey | 10/27/22
description:
Glenn digs into recent research showing that the desire to fit in with popular culture may make people appear more politically extreme than they actually are. How did John Fetterman raise funds after his abysmal debate performance? Pat Gray joins the guys to discuss the tightening races going in Republicans' favor and the possibility of a red tsunami outcome. BlazeTV host and author of "Why Thanksgiving?" Steve Deace explains why he believes a red tsunami midterm election is coming. Michigan gubernatorial candidate Tudor Dixon joins to discuss her race and blasts Gov. Gretchen Whitmer's disastrous policies. BlazeTV host Allie Beth Stuckey joins to share her latest satire video and explains the importance of humor and satire in today's political realm.
WATCH ALLIE'S DNC PARODY
https://www.youtube.com/alliebethstuckeyrelatable
